mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_room (main_board_title, main_board_content,person_id, room_name, room_pw, max_user, curr_user) VALUES (#{mainBoardTitle},#{mainBoardContent},#{personId}, #{roomName}, #{roomPw}, #{maxUser},1)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_room WHERE main_board_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') ORDER BY reg_date DESC LIMIT #{p.pageStart},#{p.amount}
SELECT * FROM tbl_room WHERE main_board_content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') ORDER BY reg_date DESC LIMIT #{p.pageStart},#{p.amount}
SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_room WHERE person_id = #{personId}
SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_room WHERE main_board_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_room WHERE main_board_content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
